original_text: when mr . hundert tells us in his narration that 'this is a story without surprises , ' we nod in agreement .
generated_text:
1. "The predictable plot of 'The Unoriginal Story' is exactly what I expected."
2. "I yawned my way through 'The Unexciting Film', knowing every twist and turn."

4. "I was underwhelmed by 'The Uninspiring Drama', it was just so... ordinary."
